site.title: American Citizens for Taiwan
site.description: Educating Americans on the importance of Taiwan to the U.S. & working to strengthen the U.S.-Taiwan relationship.

landingPage.title: American Citizens for Taiwan
landingPage.description: Educating Americans on the importance of Taiwan to the U.S. & working to strengthen the U.S.-Taiwan relationship.
landingPage.newsContent: Taiwan is a shining beacon of democracy in Asia, a top 10 U.S. trading partner, and under threat by an authoritarian anti-freedom regime. Taiwan, even for our own American benefit, deserves our full support.

introSection.title: Every American can play a role in protecting Taiwan's democracy, Especially You!
introSection.text: Find out how important Taiwan is to America by reading the blog. Ask your members of Congress to support pro-Taiwan legislation. Support ACT's work with a donation to keep things going.

subscribe.title: Don’t Fall Behind
subscribe.subtitle: Join over 2,000 subscribers who keep up with U.S. Taiwan relations

takeAction.title: Influence Congress
takeAction.subtitle: Tell Congress to support U.S.-Taiwan relations and protect Taiwan’s important democracy

supportAct.title: Donate to ACT
supportAct.subtitle: Support educating Americans about Taiwan and advancing U.S. Taiwan relations

billsPage.title: Bills
billsPage.description: A list of Taiwan related bills in Congress 🔍

introSection.title: Take Three Minutes to Make a Difference!
introSection.text:
* It only takes three minutes to ask your members of Congress to support legislation that strengthens U.S.-Taiwan relations and helps to protect Taiwan's important democracy.
* You will need to enter in your address so POPVOX can correctly identify your members of Congress.
* **Take action on each piece of legislation**. Don't worry if you can't remember which one you already took action on, the system will let you know if you try to do it twice.
* ACT uses the POPVOX system to route your message to members of Congress. Don't forget to confirm your email after you take action the first time.

membersPage.title: Members
membersPage.description: See if your members of Congress in your district are concerned about the Taiwan related bill
